We live in a time where the speed of change is profound, and accelerating. This creates "Possibility Dilation", where all possibilities could arrive sooner. #SpeculativeDesign becomes an essential for organizations to understand and prepare for all potentials. #design #nkd https://t.co/oGr1ILpG3R

The worst part of the current British story, is I can't see a way out. Status-quo protection on offer from the current government. And the lack of imagination on what the future could be, the failure to learn from peer nations, is shocking. #imagination #futures #alternatives

The horrific breakdown of modern Britain over the past decade will be taught in schools as a total leadership, political, media, and ideological failure, and the effects on the British people will sadly be felt for decades to come. #breakdown #BrokenBritain #history
Hanging on to beliefs and failing to change our views in the face of new information is a devastating and fundamental judgement flaw. #adaptation #judgement
Blunt intellectual honesty about today is so refreshing. It is a kindness to the future. #honesty #kindness
Never let your optimism for the future get in the way of your acknowledgement of current state conditions. #optimism #groundtruth #currentstate
Never let your beliefs get in the way of facts. #dogma #groundtruth

The inability of the current UK government to acknowledge ground truth on issues from climate change, to NHS collapse, to waste water disruption, to Brexit outcomes, etc. is just a catastrophic failure in leadership. @RishiSunak #BrokenBritain
